lessons.lesson: Always check if file exists before attempting to read or write
Use try-except blocks for operations that can fail (file I/O, network, etc)
Write unit tests before refactoring code to ensure functionality is preserved
Use meaningful variable and function names that describe their purpose
Never commit sensitive data (passwords, API keys, tokens) to version control
Always validate and sanitize user input before processing
Use environment variables for configuration, not hardcoded values
Document complex logic with comments explaining 'why', not 'what'
Run tests before committing code to ensure nothing is broken
Use version control and commit frequently with descriptive messages

strategies.strategy: Read requirements → Design solution → Implement → Test → Review → Deploy
Reproduce bug → Identify root cause → Fix → Write test → Verify fix
Read existing code → Write tests → Refactor → Run tests → Verify behavior unchanged
strategies.context: Safe refactoring workflow with test coverage

strategies.strategy: Check file exists → Read file → Validate content → Process → Handle errors
strategies.context: Robust file processing with error handling

strategies.strategy: Write tests → Implement feature → Run tests → Fix failures → Refactor → Deploy
Review requirements → Ask clarifying questions → Implement → Get feedback → Iterate

experiences.task: Fix FileNotFoundError in data processing script
experiences.outcome: Successfully added file existence check with clear error message. Script now handles missing files gracefully.

experiences.task: Refactor legacy code to improve readability and maintainability
experiences.outcome: Reduced code complexity by 40%. All tests passing. Code is now much more readable.

experiences.task: Implement user authentication system with JWT
experiences.outcome: Successfully implemented secure JWT authentication. All security best practices followed. Tests passing.

experiences.task: Optimize slow database query causing performance issues
experiences.outcome: Reduced query time from 5s to 0.2s by adding proper index. 96% performance improvement.
